Articles.Content:
Sorry guys but I think my time here is (tempoarily) over. RL happens, I've got school (Vanamonde, I was lying about my age) and well, stuff happens. 

This gaming community is the best I have ever seen and interacted with (I've been on the Minecraft forums before) and awesome stuff here. Heck, we survived Pewdiepie. 

Perhaps I'll be a bit more active during summer and maybe squeeze a post or two in these months but until then, farewell comrades.

\*salutes\*

\*salutes back\*

See you on the other side.
So long, Yukon! Thanks for being such an amazing community member. Hope to see you again soon. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

That's a shame to hear man. But school is more important! There will still be a strong KSP community when you come back. 

 Good luck!

MJ
Farewell, Yukon. I hope you have a wonderful time!
Bye Yukon and good luck, and we guessed ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

TEN-HUT!

Airmen, Airwomen, and Airplanes:

We gather here today to recognize Yukon0009 for meritorious service in the face of spambots.

Without further ado, I would like to personally congratulate General Yukon on his accomplishments.

PRESENT ARMS!

Yukon, pass in review.

\*tears roll down faces\*

But srsly, come back soon.

EDIT: I'm the only one here with less than 1000 posts?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T12:32:21Z" title="05/03/2015 12:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by Dman979**
Aw. Well best of luck and see you soon with more nice missions. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Bye Yukon, good luck with school! I hope you come back some day.
Yukon, you were always super helpful, kind, and inspirational to me on the forums. I want you to know you're a cool dude, and good luck with school and anything else that comes. I'll miss you bud!

Bye man.

![salute.jpg](http://i200.photobucket.com/albums/aa39/snud/salute.jpg)
Farewell Yukon. Hopefully we can meet again in the summer. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

***Remember....***

![Vmgyka7.png](http://i.imgur.com/Vmgyka7.png)

See ya on the flipside, Yukon! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Seeya mate, may the wind be at your back always.

See ya on the other side, Yukon!

Farewell, comrade.
Farewell, for now, Yukon.
Nooooooo, not you! Who is left? We'll miss you.
Those about to go to school, we salute you. I can't wait to see what new crafts you will post when you get back.
Good luck, Yukon! May your schooling go well and your love for KSP only grow.
Farewell.
Farewell Yukon!

Welp.. That's.. sad to hear.

Good luck with school, Yukon! See ya (soon)..
Yukons back
He is? Hooray!

> 
> Yukons back

Wait, really?
